sub_title: Startup and VC Recruiter | 500 Global Alum, Ex-Sezzle, Ex-Revolut, Ex-Moss
summary:
I’m a proactive recruiter with over ten years of experience in talent acquisition, focusing on tech products, enterprises, agencies, and outsourcing/outstaffing businesses. I’ve led senior+ tech, non-tech (marketing, sales, finance, HR/recruitment), and C-level (CEO, CTO, CFO, COO, CMO etc) hiring projects across industries like SaaS, fintech, Digital, AI, ML, CRM, E-commerce, IoT, Medtech, research, healthcare, travel/booking, web3, telecom, and automotive. I build strong relationships with global stakeholders and candidates (EMEA, USA, LATAM, APAC), tailoring recruitment strategies to fit consulting needs, startups, hyper-grow scaleups, and enterprises.

My expertise includes strategic stakeholder engagement, AI-driven hiring, hyper-personalized outreach automation, and advanced sourcing techniques. I’m highly skilled in behavioural interviewing, AI screening, and assessment to reduce time-to-hire, improve candidate quality, and lower hiring costs. I leverage large language models and industry trends to deliver innovative talent acquisition solutions.

Key Strengths:
Industry Expertise: Experience across consulting, fintech, healthcare, automotive, SaaS, digital, CRM, IoT, and more.
Global Talent Pools: Sourcing talent from regions like Europe (Spain, Germany, Portugal, France, Italy, Austria, Hungary, Poland, Romania, Ukraine), USA, UK, Latin America, Mid East, Asia, Australia and beyond.
Data-Driven Recruitment: Utilizing data insights for market trends and strategic decision-making.
Advanced Sourcing: Mastery of Linkedin Rec, Boolean Strings composing (X-ray, file searches, pictures, etc), GitHub, Stack Overflow, Facebook, X and tools like Phantombooster and Quickli.
ATS Tools: Proficient in GreenHouse, Lever, Workable, and Recruitee for recruitment optimisation.
AI & Automation: Leveraging GPT-based automation and tools like Source Whale, MixMax, and Bumerang.
Video Engagement: Using Loom and Vidyard to create engaging candidate experiences.
Skill Assessment: Expertise in platforms like HackerRank, Codility, and Metaview.
Project Management: Efficient recruitment operations with tools like Trello and Jira.
Other: Proficient in GPT prompting and GPTs, Calendly, OctoHR, and GlossaryTech for streamlined processes.

Hybrid Office Availability: Open to hybrid office work in Barcelona, Valencia, and Zaragoza.
Work Permit: Valid for Spain, available for B2B contracts.
Work Formats: full-time hybrid, remote, part-time (hourly-based), or project-based work.

Let’s connect. Reach out to me!

school.name: Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv

profile_positions.description:
Lead full-cycle hiring for AI/ML, SWE, GTM, Finance, Leadership and C-level roles, ensuring high-quality candidate matches.
Work with AI/ML startups, VCs, and tech leaders to define hiring roadmaps and secure key talent.
Engage and collaborate with founders, hiring managers, and key stakeholders to drive recruitment success.
Manage, coach, and mentor recruiters to optimise sourcing strategies and maximise hiring efficiency.
Contribute to the development and refinement of AI-powered recruitment tools.
Streamline recruitment workflows, integrate automation, and improve data-driven decision-making.
Drive business development by engaging new clients and advising on hiring strategies.
Analyze hiring trends, salary benchmarks, and talent market dynamics to refine hiring approaches.
Enhance employer branding and refine outreach strategies to attract top AI/ML talent.
Advise clients on interview structuring, technical assessments, and offer negotiation to improve hiring success rates.
Collaborate with product, engineering, and leadership teams to align hiring with company growth strategies.
profile_positions.title: Lead AI/ML Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Perlentaucher is a technology-driven recruitment firm headquartered in Berlin, specializing in delivering an unparalleled candidate experience that serves as the foundation for lasting relationships with your organization’s future high-impact performers. Leveraging a team steeped in technological expertise, we go beyond conventional reach to identify and captivate the attention of high-calibre talent through tailor-made, creative outreach which is loved by talents. Our approach is further amplified by inventive performance recruiting campaigns, executed through data-driven programmatic and performance marketing strategies. We deliver where others don’t.
 Partner with businesses seeking transformative talent solutions. 
● Conduct detailed workshops to capture the essence of each role. 
● Craft magnetic job descriptions from deep client insights.
● Utilise AI to identify standout candidates across industries.
● Embed advanced tech into evolving recruitment practices.
● Assess candidates against role-specific benchmarks for an optimal fit.
● Maintain essential candidate data precisely through robust tracking systems. 
● Execute tailored, high-response communication campaigns.
● Provide clients with real-time insights into recruitment milestones.
● Influence company direction with frontline recruitment intelligence.
profile_positions.title: AI Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
● Designed and executed talent acquisition strategies in key markets (Germany, Netherlands, UK, Spain, Lithuania)
● Built strong talent pipelines using innovative approaches for tech and non-tech roles
● Conducted end-to-end candidate interviews and reference checks with Hiring Managers
● Implemented new sourcing channels and conducted sourcing training for the team
● Partnered closely with engineering teams to find top talent
● Led talent acquisition projects and process improvements, including ATS optimization

Achievements: implemented strategies that reduced time to hire by 50%, from 55-60 days to 30-35 on average; assumed the role of sourcing lead for the department, overseeing all sourcing activities and providing guidance to the team; delivered training sessions for over 10 recruiters, resulting in a 30% increase in candidate pipeline quality; closed three critical engineering director roles for new departments, resulting in the successful launch of three new products and a 15% increase in overall revenue.

Closed positions: 6 senior Java backend, 5 Senior React frontend, 3 Engineering Managers, Lead Data Engineer, SRE, Head of InfoSec, Product Managers, Salesforce engineers, Strategic Researcher, Payroll Spec.

Achievements: in collaboration with hiring managers implemented recruitment procedures that allowed to hire of high-quality (domain-experienced) candidates, and reduced the time to hire twice to 35-40 days.
